title: Bernie and Biden have been courting voters virtually, and it’s not going well - The Washington Post

content: They must get good at being authentic and engaging from their sofa, which is not as easy as all those Instagram influencers and YouTube stars make it seem. Live-streaming from your house is not the same thing as settling into a prime block on cable news where… [+5652 chars]
